content: Updated test 5, which (unfortunately) passed even when underscore was taken in account.
Test cases here are actually bad, as there are none with uppercase characters, but the validators do have them. This should at least be mixed. Validators shouldn' t be traps.

9 months later, it seems neither the puzzle submitter nor anyone from [CG] cares to do anything about crap like this.
I swapped 2 of the tests so we get some uppercase in IDE tests. But I wish I could just delete this instead, and disallow people that approved it from approving any more puzzles.
